system:
note description: "Objects that represent paragraph formatting information." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2017-03-27 13:31:29 -0700 (Mon, 27 Mar 2017) $" revision: "$Revision: 100058 $"
class ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xmlEV_PARAGRAPH_FORMAT_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_paragraph_format_i.xmlEV_PARAGRAPH_FORMAT_I
create ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_makemake
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_old_make../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_old_makeold_make (an_interface: attached like ../implementation_interface/ev_paragraph_format_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface) -- Create paragraph format do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_assign_interfaceassign_interface (an_interface) end
f_make../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_makemake -- Do nothing do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_set_is_initializedset_is_initialized (True) end
feature -- Status report
f_alignment../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_alignmentalignment: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Current alignment. See EV_PARAGRAPH_CONSTANTS -- for possible values.
f_is_left_aligned../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_is_left_alignedis_left_aligned: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current left aligned? do Result := ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_alignmentalignment = {../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xmlEV_PARAGRAPH_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_alignment_leftalignment_left end
f_is_center_aligned../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_is_center_alignedis_center_aligned: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current center aligned? do Result := ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_alignmentalignment = {../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xmlEV_PARAGRAPH_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_alignment_centeralignment_center end
f_is_right_aligned../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_is_right_alignedis_right_aligned: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current right aligned? do Result := ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_alignmentalignment = {../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xmlEV_PARAGRAPH_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_alignment_rightalignment_right end
f_is_justified../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_is_justifiedis_justified: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current justified? do Result := ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_alignmentalignment = {../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xmlEV_PARAGRAPH_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_alignment_justifiedalignment_justified end
f_left_margin../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_left_marginleft_margin: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Left margin between border and text in pixels
f_right_margin../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_right_marginright_margin: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Right margin between line end and border in pixels
f_top_spacing../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_top_spacingtop_spacing: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Spacing between top of paragraph and previous line in pixels.
f_bottom_spacing../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_bottom_spacingbottom_spacing: FalseINTEGER_32 -- Spacing between bottom of paragraph and next line in pixels.
feature -- Status setting
f_enable_left_alignment../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_enable_left_alignmentenable_left_alignment -- Ensure ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_is_left_alignedis_left_aligned is True. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_set_alignmentset_alignment ({../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xmlEV_PARAGRAPH_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_alignment_leftalignment_left) end
f_enable_center_alignment../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_enable_center_alignmentenable_center_alignment -- Ensure ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_is_center_alignedis_center_aligned is True. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_set_alignmentset_alignment ({../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xmlEV_PARAGRAPH_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_alignment_centeralignment_center) end
f_enable_right_alignment../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_enable_right_alignmentenable_right_alignment -- Ensure ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_is_right_alignedis_right_aligned is True. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_set_alignmentset_alignment ({../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xmlEV_PARAGRAPH_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_alignment_rightalignment_right) end
f_enable_justification../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_enable_justificationenable_justification -- Ensure ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_is_justifiedis_justified is True. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_set_alignmentset_alignment ({../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xmlEV_PARAGRAPH_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_alignment_justifiedalignment_justified) end
f_set_alignment../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_set_alignmentset_alignment (a_alignment: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_alignmentalignment to a_alignment do ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_alignmentalignment := a_alignment end
f_set_left_margin../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_set_left_marginset_left_margin (a_margin: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_left_marginleft_margin to a_margin. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_left_marginleft_margin := a_margin end
f_set_right_margin../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_set_right_marginset_right_margin (a_margin: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_right_marginright_margin to a_margin. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_right_marginright_margin := a_margin end
f_set_top_spacing../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_set_top_spacingset_top_spacing (a_margin: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_top_spacingtop_spacing to a_margin. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_top_spacingtop_spacing := a_margin end
f_set_bottom_spacing../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_set_bottom_spacingset_bottom_spacing (a_margin: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Set ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_bottom_spacingbottom_spacing to a_margin. do ../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_bottom_spacingbottom_spacing := a_margin end
feature {../implementation_gtk/ev_rich_text_imp.xmlEV_RICH_TEXT_IMP} -- Implementation
f_new_paragraph_tag_from_applicable_attributes../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_new_paragraph_tag_from_applicable_attributesnew_paragraph_tag_from_applicable_attributes (applicable_attributes: ../interface/ev_paragraph_format_range_information.xmlEV_PARAGRAPH_FORMAT_RANGE_INFORMATION): FalsePOINTER local propname: ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING do Result := {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_text_tag_newgtk_text_tag_new (Falsedefault_pointer) if applicable_attributes.../interface/ev_paragraph_format_range_information.xml#f_alignmentalignment then propname := create {attached ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING}.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_set_with_eiffel_stringset_with_eiffel_string ("justification") inspect {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_justify_right_enumgtk_justify_right_enum) when {../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xmlEV_PARAGRAPH_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_alignment_justifiedalignment_justified then {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_g_object_set_integerg_object_set_integer (Result, propname.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_itemitem, {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gtk_justify_fill_enumgtk_justify_fill_enum) end end if applicable_attributes.../interface/ev_paragraph_format_range_information.xml#f_left_marginleft_margin then propname := create {attached ../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xmlEV_GTK_C_STRING}.../implementation_gtk/ev_gtk_c_string.xml#f_set_with_eiffel_stringset_with_eiffel_string ("left-margin") f_dummy_paragraph_format_range_information../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_dummy_paragraph_format_range_informationdummy_paragraph_format_range_information: ../interface/ev_paragraph_format_range_information.xmlEV_PARAGRAPH_FORMAT_RANGE_INFORMATION do create Result.../interface/ev_paragraph_format_range_information.xml#f_make_with_flagsmake_with_flags ({../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xmlEV_PARAGRAPH_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_alignmentalignment | {../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xmlEV_PARAGRAPH_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_left_marginleft_margin | {../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xmlEV_PARAGRAPH_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_right_marginright_margin | {../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xmlEV_PARAGRAPH_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_top_spacingtop_spacing | {../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xmlEV_PARAGRAPH_CONSTANTS}.../interface/ev_paragraph_constants.xml#f_bottom_spacingbottom_spacing) end
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_destroy../implementation_gtk/ev_paragraph_format_imp.xml#f_destroydestroy -- Clean up Current do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_set_is_destroyedset_is_destroyed (True) end
